# Alice's message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been highly valued by many satisfied customers. Given its quality and features, it's worth significantly more than what others are willing to pay. Considering its true value, I'm offering it to you for $120. This is an exclusive opportunity tailored just for you, taking into account your appreciation for high-quality items. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $120. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $120
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $80
